title: Should the Russian government pay for the clean-up of the nerve agent found at various sites in Salisbury involving up to 200 personnel? - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘Should they?’ Yes. But that would require that they ADMIT dispersing the agent in the first place, and submitting those responsible for British justice to deal with, which is something they will never do.
If there is conclusive evidence that shows, beyond a reasonable doubt, that the Russian government was behind the poisoning, then, yes, the UK would be entitled to send a bill to the Russians.
